seg-source.mrk: Mobile Setup

trans-unit.source: Access the Mobile Setup page from the navigation pane by clicking Departments > COSMO CONSULT > cc|mobile solution > Setup > Mobile Setup. In this page, basic settings for communication between Microsoft Dynamics NAV and HTTP server, the management of documents (Editor) and the layout of the application can be made.

seg-source.mrk: Access the Mobile Setup page from the navigation pane by clicking Departments > COSMO CONSULT > cc|mobile solution > Setup > Mobile Setup.
In this page, basic settings for communication between Microsoft Dynamics NAV and HTTP server, the management of documents (Editor) and the layout of the application can be made.

trans-unit.source: When the Mobile Setup page is first opened, default values are set automatically for relevant fields.

seg-source.mrk: When the Mobile Setup page is first opened, default values are set automatically for relevant fields.
General FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.
: Mobile Setup, General FastTab
Field
Description
URL

trans-unit.source: Identifies the URL of the HTTP-Server according to the following pattern: “http://<computer name>|<url>:port/”

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the URL of the HTTP-Server according to the following pattern: “http://<computer name>|<url>:port/”

trans-unit.source: This field is mandatory and is auto-populated with the current host name of the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Service.

seg-source.mrk: This field is mandatory and is auto-populated with the current host name of the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Service.
Note

trans-unit.source: Only local access is possible if address “127.0.0.1” or “localhost” is used. Ideally, the URL of the computer in the network should be used.

seg-source.mrk: Only local access is possible if address “127.0.0.1” or “localhost” is used.
Ideally, the URL of the computer in the network should be used.
Version cc|mobile solution

trans-unit.source: Indicates the current version of cc|mobile solution.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the current version of cc|mobile solution.
Root-Path

trans-unit.source: Identifies the root directory of the HTTP-Server. In this folder, subdirectories are created and generated files will be stored there.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the root directory of the HTTP-Server.
In this folder, subdirectories are created and generated files will be stored there.

trans-unit.source: This folder must be identical to the folder specified in the HTTP-Server settings (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="HTTP Server Setup.htm#_Ref429124767" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"General Tab" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: This folder must be identical to the folder specified in the HTTP-Server settings (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="HTTP Server Setup.htm#_Ref429124767" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"General Tab" on page 1</MadCap:xref>).
Image Directory

trans-unit.source: Identifies the directory where images are stored. This folder must be a subfolder of the root path.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the directory where images are stored.
This folder must be a subfolder of the root path.
Portal FastTab

trans-unit.source: The Portal FastTab contains fields that are used as default for all handhelds.

seg-source.mrk: The Portal FastTab contains fields that are used as default for all handhelds.
: Mobile Setup, Portal FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.
Field
Description
Start Page

trans-unit.source: Indicates the document to be used as the start page for handhelds. This value is used if no value has been entered in the Handheld or Handheld Group.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the document to be used as the start page for handhelds.
This value is used if no value has been entered in the Handheld or Handheld Group.
About Page

trans-unit.source: Indicates the document to be displayed when the About page link is clicked.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the document to be displayed when the About page link is clicked.
Server FastTab

trans-unit.source: The Server FastTab contains settings for the Mobile Server in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: The Server FastTab contains settings for the Mobile Server in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.
: Mobile Setup, Server FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.
Field
Description
Server Journal

trans-unit.source: Indicates what types of requests should be logged. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates what types of requests should be logged.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: All – All requests will be logged.

seg-source.mrk: All – All requests will be logged.

trans-unit.source: Yes – Same as All (for later usage).

seg-source.mrk: Yes – Same as All (for later usage).

trans-unit.source: No – No requests will be logged.

seg-source.mrk: No – No requests will be logged.
Log Translated

trans-unit.source: If selected, the texts from documents are stored in Microsoft Dynamics NAV to provide a later translation.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the texts from documents are stored in Microsoft Dynamics NAV to provide a later translation.
Time Logging

trans-unit.source: If selected, the duration in milliseconds that was needed for creating a certain document will be specified. The recording of information occurs in the file “<Temp Path>\MobTime.log”.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the duration in milliseconds that was needed for creating a certain document will be specified.
The recording of information occurs in the file “<Temp Path>\MobTime.log”.
Logging of Generator Buffer

trans-unit.source: If selected, the entries of the table will be logged in TmpTab. The recording of information occurs in the file “<Temp Path>\MobTmpTab.log”.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the entries of the table will be logged in TmpTab.
The recording of information occurs in the file “<Temp Path>\MobTmpTab.log”.
Session Idle Time (Min)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the idle time (in minutes) that may be passed until a session is declared as invalid and a new login of the handheld is required.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the idle time (in minutes) that may be passed until a session is declared as invalid and a new login of the handheld is required.
Search Timeout (s)

trans-unit.source: Specifies the duration (in seconds) in which the generator is allowed to create a document. The checking of this duration occurs by using given functions.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the duration (in seconds) in which the generator is allowed to create a document.
The checking of this duration occurs by using given functions.
Editor FastTab

trans-unit.source: The Editor FastTab contains settings for the Document Editor.

seg-source.mrk: The Editor FastTab contains settings for the Document Editor.
: Mobile Setup, Editor FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.
Field
Description
Schema Path

trans-unit.source: Identifies the path to the provided XSD file. The default name of the XSD file is “SchemaVx.x.xsd”.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the path to the provided XSD file.
The default name of the XSD file is “SchemaVx.x.xsd”.
Temp Path

trans-unit.source: Identifies the folder that the system should use for storing temporary files. This folder is mainly used for Document Object Model (DOM) Validation (see next field).

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the folder that the system should use for storing temporary files.
This folder is mainly used for Document Object Model (DOM) Validation (see next field).
DOM Validation

trans-unit.source: Disables/Enables the external validation. The documents can also be validated without using the MSXML parser.

seg-source.mrk: Disables/Enables the external validation.
The documents can also be validated without using the MSXML parser.
Delete XML-File for DOM Validation

trans-unit.source: If selected, generated XML files will be deleted after DOM Validation.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, generated XML files will be deleted after DOM Validation.

trans-unit.source: If not selected, the generated XML file will be stored in the temp folder with the name “<Deckname>.xml”.

seg-source.mrk: If not selected, the generated XML file will be stored in the temp folder with the name “<Deckname>.xml”.
Schema Import Date

trans-unit.source: Indicates the date on which the XSD schema was last imported successfully.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the date on which the XSD schema was last imported successfully.
Schema Exists

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a correct schema exists or not.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates whether a correct schema exists or not.
Syntax Highlighting
Enables/Disables syntax highlighting in documents.
Layout FastTab

trans-unit.source: The Layout FastTab contains settings related to the view but are not dependent on documents.

seg-source.mrk: The Layout FastTab contains settings related to the view but are not dependent on documents.
: Mobile Setup, Layout FastTab
Field
Description
E-Mail/Phone Link Image

trans-unit.source: Identifies an image file to be displayed for E-Mail/Phone Links.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies an image file to be displayed for E-Mail/Phone Links.
Company Logo

trans-unit.source: Identifies the image file to be displayed on top if the Company Logo field = show.

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the image file to be displayed on top if the Company Logo field = show.
Navigation Position

trans-unit.source: Indicates the placement of the navigation links. The options are Left, Right, Down and Up.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the placement of the navigation links.
The options are Left, Right, Down and Up.
Navigation Alignment

trans-unit.source: Determines if the navigation links are ordered vertically or horizontally.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the navigation links are ordered vertically or horizontally.
Navigation Style

trans-unit.source: Determines if the navigation links are displayed as Links or Buttons.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if the navigation links are displayed as Links or Buttons.
Navigation on Login

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the navigation should be displayed on the login page or not.

seg-source.mrk: Determines whether the navigation should be displayed on the login page or not.
Default Language Code

trans-unit.source: Indicates the language that will be used as the default value when handhelds are created.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the language that will be used as the default value when handhelds are created.
Style Sheet File

trans-unit.source: Indicates the *.css file to be used for styles of HTML page. Create and select another file to customize the view.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the *.css file to be used for styles of HTML page.
Create and select another file to customize the view.
Records per Page

trans-unit.source: Determines how many entries of lists should be displayed on a single page.

seg-source.mrk: Determines how many entries of lists should be displayed on a single page.
HTML Window Width/Height

trans-unit.source: Indicates the width and height value to be used for rendering the layout of HTML pages if not set on the handheld.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the width and height value to be used for rendering the layout of HTML pages if not set on the handheld.
HTML One Window

trans-unit.source: If selected (recommended), all navigations to new pages will be rendered in the same window.

seg-source.mrk: If selected (recommended), all navigations to new pages will be rendered in the same window.
HTML Image Type

trans-unit.source: Indicates the file type of images found in the Image Directory path to be used for rendering images. Use png to ensure that all required images already exist. The options are png, jpg and gif.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the file type of images found in the Image Directory path to be used for rendering images.
Use png to ensure that all required images already exist.
The options are png, jpg and gif.
Keep HTML Image Type

trans-unit.source: Indicates another image file type that can be used in addition to the type indicated in the HTML Image Type field.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates another image file type that can be used in addition to the type indicated in the HTML Image Type field.

trans-unit.source: Every image specified in documents having an file type <> to the value in the Keep HTML Image Type field will be replaced with the type specified in the HTML Image Type field. Therefore, to allow the display of gifs, set this field to gif.

seg-source.mrk: Every image specified in documents having an file type <> to the value in the Keep HTML Image Type field will be replaced with the type specified in the HTML Image Type field.
Therefore, to allow the display of gifs, set this field to gif.
Top Bar

trans-unit.source: Shows/hides the top bar, containing the company logo, title and so on.

seg-source.mrk: Shows/hides the top bar, containing the company logo, title and so on.
Card Title

trans-unit.source: Shows/hides a bar on top, displaying the current card title.

seg-source.mrk: Shows/hides a bar on top, displaying the current card title.
